summary:
ENB
<br />Do not use COT or RLO or ELFX with this ENB
descriptionHtml:
RK ENB v250a
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />How To install
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />1.Open SkyrimPrefs.ini located in My DocumentMy GamesSkyrim
<br />Modify this line
<br />
<br />bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
<br />bTreesReceiveShadows=1
<br />bDrawLandShadows=1
<br />bShadowsOnGrass=1
<br />iMaxAnisotropy=0
<br />iMultiSample=0
<br />
<br />Save and exit
<br />If that command line doesn't exist, input manually.
<br />
<br />2. The develpoer of ENB, Boris Vorontsov : http://enbdev.com/
<br />Download version 250 file. and Put in
<br />Skyrim/
<br />
<br />3. My ENB File Put in
<br />Skyrim
<br />
<br />and
<br />
<br />Remember Plugin Order
<br />
<br />[0]Weather.esp
<br />[0]Lights.esp
<br />[1]Interior.esp
<br />[1]Lights - exterior.esp
<br />[1]Lights - dungeon.esp
<br />[1]Dawnguard.esp
<br />[1]Dragonborn.esp
<br />[2]Remove Interior Fog V2 - Skyrim.esp
<br />[2]Remove Interior Fog V2 - Dawnguard.esp
<br />[2]Remove Interior Fog V2 - Hearthfire.esp
<br />[2]Remove Interior Fog V2 - Dragonborn.esp
<br />[2]Remove Interior Fog V2 - Full Version.esp (if you have Legendary. only this)
<br />[3]Tweak_Lighting.esp
<br />
<br />active plz
<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />CREDITS:
<br />Boris Vorontsov (ENB Developer)
<br />Reallike Enb
<br />KONAN ENBÏùò Lighting
<br />Opethfeldt 7 ENB
<br />POLO ENB
<br />Remove interior Fog
<br />Particle Patch
<br />Superl3 0.2 ENB
<br />
<br />Thanks.^^
author: Algoism
